snippet: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad fanned the flames of confrontation with Israel on Friday on the annual Iranian holiday that calls for the Palestinian reclamation of Jerusalem from Israel’s control.
abstract: Iranian Pres Mahmoud Ahmadinejad delivers a violent anti-Israel message on Quds Day, annual Iranian holiday that calls for the Palestinian reclamation of Jerusalem from Israel's control, further stoking tensions between the two countries.
lead_paragraph: Mahmoud Ahmadinejad fanned the flames of confrontation with Israel on Friday on the annual Iranian holiday that calls for the Palestinian reclamation of Jerusalem from Israel’s control.

headline.seo: Ahmadinejad of Iran Calls Israel ‘an Insult to Humankind’
headline.main: Iran’s President Calls Israel ‘an Insult to Humankind’
headline.print_headline: Iran’s President Calls Israel ‘an Insult to Humankind’
